casebody.data:
George BANKSTON, Appellant, v. AETNA CASUALTY AND SURETY CO., HARTFORD, CONNECTICUT, Appellee. No. 21461. United States Court of Appeals Fifth Circuit. Feb. 18, 1965. L. B. Ponder, Jr., Ponder & Ponder and J. Lynn Ponder, Amite, La., for appellant. Iddo Pittman, Jr., and Pittman & Matheny, Hammond, La., for appellee.

Before WISDOM and GEWIN, Circuit Judges, and BOOTLE, District Judge.

PER CURIAM:

' Judgment affirmed.
